title: Is my reality nothing but a simulation in my mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: I might be more inclined to describe it as a virtual HoloDeck in which the “mind” process is the simulation that then interprets the “raw feed”. And no I can’t tell you where or how all that stuff happens. We are all but simulations within it. Shakespeare got it well. ”All the world's a stage, And all the men and women merely players; They have their exits and their entrances, And one man in his time plays many parts, His acts being seven ages. ” And the whole thing has been called “maya”, “the dream”, illusion and lots of other names. We could discuss endless opinion of how to describe a virtual holodeck output. We all see it all the time. And occasionally there is a glitch in the Matrix that is noticed and remembered.
